mean_cn: n. 罗嗦，冗长，措辞方式
mean_en: speech or writing that contains too many words or that uses words that are more difficult than necessary
sentence: Mr. Bao describes having a haircut with too much meaningless verbiage.
sentence_trans: 包大人用了太多废话来描述剪头发。
word_etyma: verbi=verb词 + age年龄 → 上了年纪的人喜欢唠叨 → verbiage冗词，废话
